title: Shakespeare and Company Project Dataset: Lending Library Events

fields.name: event_type
fields.description: type of event

fields.name: start_date
fields.description: start date, if known (ISO 8601 format; YYYY, YY-MM, YYYY-MM-DD, or --MM-DD)

fields.name: end_date
fields.description: end date, if known (ISO 8601 format; YYYY, YY-MM, YYYY-MM-DD, or --MM-DD)

fields.name: member_uris
fields.description: list of URIs for members associated with this event (could be multiple, separated by semicolons)

fields.name: member_names
fields.description: list of full member names with variants (multiple, separated by semicolons; order matches member_uris)

fields.name: member_sort_names
fields.description: list of member authorized sort names (multiple, separated by semicolons; order matches member_uris)

fields.name: subscription_price_paid
fields.description: amount paid for a subscription event (numeric)

fields.name: subscription_deposit
fields.description: amount deposited for a new subscription (numeric)

fields.name: subscription_duration
fields.description: logical subscription duration (human readable, e.g. 6 months, 1 year)

fields.name: subscription_duration_days
fields.description: actual subscription duration in days (integer)

fields.name: subscription_volumes
fields.description: number of volumes paid for in the subscription

fields.name: subscription_category
fields.description: subscription plan, if any; see https://shakespeareandco.princeton.edu/about/faq/#lending-library-plans

fields.name: subscription_purchase_date
fields.description: date the subscription was purchased (ISO 8601 format; YYYY, YY-MM, YYYY-MM-DD, or --MM-DD)

fields.name: reimbursement_refund
fields.description: amount refunded for a reimbursement event (numeric)

fields.name: borrow_status
fields.description: status code indicating how a borrowing event ended (Returned, Bought, Missing, Unknown)

fields.name: borrow_duration_days
fields.description: borrow duration in days, if known (integer)

fields.name: purchase_price
fields.description: amount paid for a purchase

fields.name: currency
fields.description: currency code indicating currency of subscription price paid, deposit, reimbursement refund, or purchase price (ISO 4217 currency code)

fields.name: item_uri
fields.description: identifier for book associated with this event, if there is one

fields.name: item_title
fields.description: title of the book associated with this event

fields.name: item_volume
fields.description: volume / issue information for this event, if item is a multivolume work or periodical and volume/issue information is known

fields.name: item_authors
fields.description: list of authors for this work; authorized names, last name first (could be multiple; separated by semicolon)

fields.name: item_year
fields.description: publication year

fields.name: item_notes
fields.description: notes about the item

fields.name: source_type
fields.description: type of source this data was drawn from (could be multiple; separated by semicolons)

fields.name: source_citation
fields.description: bibliographic citation for the source of this data

fields.name: source_manifest
fields.description: IIIF Presentation manifest URL for a digitized edition of the source of this data (could be multiple; separated by semicolons)

fields.name: source_image
fields.description: IIIF Image URL for the digitized image in the IIIF manifest documenting this event, if known (could be multiple; separated by semicolons)
